The {{Lang|'''Raiden Shogun'''|ja={{Rubi|雷|らい|電|でん|将|しょう|軍|ぐん}}|ja_rm=Raiden Shougun}} is a playable [[Electro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

As [[the Shogun]], she is the vessel of [[Beelzebul]], the current Electro [[Archon]] of [[Inazuma]].
